# removeTabViewItem(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the specified item from the tab view’s array of tab view items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeTabViewItem(_ tabViewItem: NSTabViewItem)
```

## Parameters

- **tabViewItem**: The tab view item to be removed.

## Discussion

If there is a delegate and the delegate supports it, sends the delegate the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTabViewDelegate/tabViewDidChangeNumberOfTabViewItems(_:)] message.

## Related Documentation

- **tabViewItems**: The tab view’s array of tab view items.

## Adding and Removing Tabs

- **addTabViewItem(_:)**: Adds the specified tab item.
- **insertTabViewItem(_:at:)**: Inserts the specified item into the tab view’s array of tab view items at the specified index.
